name: Maireana French Flax Linen Sheet Set

static_data.origin: Flax grown in France, sewn in Portugal

content_triage.marketing_hook: Experience the effortless luxury of 100% pure French flax. Stonewashed for a lived-in feel from night one, our Maireana linen is temperature-regulating and gets softer with every wash.

care_instructions: Gentle machine wash cool (30°C)
Line dry in shade to prevent fading
Expect initial shedding—this is normal for natural flax fibres
Avoid bleach or harsh detergents
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: LINEN SHEDDING: Natural linen releases excess fibres in the first 3-4 washes. To manage this, wash separately and use wool dryer balls on a cool setting to help the shedding process along.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Breathable linen duvet cover finished with natural coconut button closures and internal ties to keep your quilt perfectly in place.

care_instructions: Gentle cold machine wash
Line dry in shade
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: BUTTON CARE: Coconut buttons are natural and durable, but avoid running them through heavy, hot tumble dry cycles to prevent cracking.

static_data.origin: Ethically made in China (Closed Loop System)

content_triage.marketing_hook: The ultimate plant-based alternative to down. Hypoallergenic, temperature-regulating, and crafted in a closed-loop system.

care_instructions: Dry clean recommended, or gentle cold machine wash
Lay flat to dry
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: MAINTENANCE: Bamboo Lyocell can become heavy when wet. Ensure your washing machine can handle the weight, or seek professional cleaning for longevity.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Add grounded texture and warmth to the foot of your bed with this heavyweight, sustainable hemp fabric runner.

care_instructions: Spot clean preferred
Cold hand wash if necessary
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: HEMP WEAVE: Hemp is exceptionally strong. It will soften over years of use but starts with a robust, tactile texture.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Sleep deeply while protecting delicate skin. Made from vegetable-dyed peace silk to prevent sleep creases and block out the world.

care_instructions: Cold hand wash only with mild silk detergent
Dry flat in shade
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: DYE CARE: Vegetable dyes are gentle on the skin but can fade if exposed to direct sunlight or harsh chemicals. Hand wash only.

static_data.origin: Designed in Melbourne, Made in India

content_triage.marketing_hook: Experience calming, deep-pressure stimulation. An organic cotton shell filled with micro glass beads for a grounding, plastic-free sleep.
technical_specs: Quilted grid for even weight distribution

care_instructions: Spot clean recommended
Machine wash cold on gentle cycle only if machine capacity allows
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: WEIGHT SELECTION: For optimal comfort, choose a blanket weight that is roughly 10% of your body weight.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Elevate your daily ritual with our Saltbush ceramics. Each plate is hand-glazed, meaning no two pieces are identical—bringing a sense of 'Wabi-Sabi' and organic beauty to your table.

care_instructions: Avoid thermal shock (moving from freezer to hot oven)
Use non-abrasive detergents to maintain glaze luster
Stack with felt dividers to prevent surface scratching
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: THERMAL SAFETY: While microwave safe, stoneware retains heat efficiently. Always use a cloth or mitt when removing plates from the microwave to avoid burns.

content_triage.marketing_hook: A deep, wide-brimmed bowl designed perfectly for hearty soups, pastas, and salads. Hand-glazed for a unique finish.

care_instructions: Dishwasher safe
Avoid thermal shock
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: WABI-SABI: Expect slight variations in the glaze. This is the hallmark of handmade ceramics, not a defect.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Serve in style. Sustainably harvested Acacia wood, sealed with food-safe mineral oil to showcase the beautiful natural grain.

care_instructions: Hand wash only; never soak
Re-oil with food-safe mineral oil every 3-6 months
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: WOOD MAINTENANCE: Do not place in the dishwasher. Exposure to prolonged moisture or heat will warp and crack the timber.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Thick, durable glass made from post-consumer waste. Perfect for everyday hydration or evening cocktails.

care_instructions: Dishwasher safe
Avoid pouring boiling water directly into cold glass
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: RECYCLED IMPERFECTIONS: Tiny air bubbles or slight ripples in the glass are natural characteristics of the recycling process.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Minimalist elegance for your dining table. Featuring polished brass heads and sustainable teak handles.

care_instructions: Hand wash only
Dry immediately to prevent water spots on brass
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: BRASS CARE: Brass naturally patinas over time. To restore shine, use a natural paste of lemon juice and baking soda, rub gently, and rinse.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Never use single-use plastic again. A reusable knife, fork, spoon, and straw safely housed in an organic canvas pouch.

care_instructions: Hand wash bamboo to preserve lifespan
Machine wash pouch on cold
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: TRAVEL READY: Meets TSA and airport security standards for carry-on luggage.

content_triage.marketing_hook: A double-tier stainless steel lunchbox featuring a bamboo lid that doubles as a chopping board. The ultimate plastic-free prep station.

care_instructions: Steel base is dishwasher safe
Hand wash bamboo lid
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: LEAK PROOFING: While highly water-resistant due to the silicone seal, it is not 100% leak-proof for thin liquids like soup.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Ditch the cling wrap for good. Our wraps use locally sourced WA beeswax and organic cotton to keep your food fresh naturally. They are breathable, reusable, and fully compostable.
technical_specs: WA Beeswax, Jojoba Oil, Pine Resin

care_instructions: Wash in cool, soapy water
Do not use with raw meat or hot food
Air dry away from heat sources
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: REVIVAL TIP: If your wraps lose their stickiness, place them on baking paper in a 100°C oven for 2 minutes to redistribute the wax. Remove and hang to cool instantly.

content_triage.marketing_hook: The plant-based alternative. 100% vegan wraps using Candelilla wax to replace single-use plastics in your fridge.
technical_specs: Candelilla Wax, Soy Wax, Tree Resin

care_instructions: Wash in cool water
Keep away from heat
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: STIFFNESS: Vegan wax can feel slightly stiffer than beeswax initially. The warmth of your hands will mold it perfectly over bowls.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Food-grade silicone lids that stretch to fit bowls, jars, and even half-cut fruit. The ultimate airtight seal.

care_instructions: Dishwasher safe
Ensure edges are dry before stretching over a container
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: USAGE: For a perfect seal, press down on the center of the lid while pulling the tabs over the edges of the bowl to expel excess air.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Absorbs 15x its weight in water. These cellulose and cotton blend cloths replace paper towels and break down cleanly in your compost.

care_instructions: Machine washable up to 60°C
Can be boiled for 1 minute to sterilize
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: DISPOSAL: Simply cut into small pieces and bury in your home compost. Breaks down completely in 6-8 weeks.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Tough on grease, safe on non-stick. Made from natural coconut husk fibres, bypassing synthetic plastic sponges entirely.

care_instructions: Rinse and shake dry after use
Store in a well-ventilated spot
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: RUST PREVENTION: The core wire is galvanized but continuous submersion in water may eventually cause minor rust. Hang to dry.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Elevate your pantry organization. Borosilicate glass jars fitted with an airtight bamboo suction lid for maximum freshness.

care_instructions: Glass is dishwasher safe
Hand wash bamboo lids and dry immediately
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: AIRTIGHT SEAL: The silicone ring can be removed for deep cleaning if storing strongly scented foods.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Chlorine-free, totally compostable parchment paper for baking. Safe for your food and the earth.

care_instructions: Single or double use depending on baking mess
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: COMPOSTING: Once heavily soiled with oils, toss it directly into your green bin or home compost.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Heavy, warm, and highly durable. Woven entirely from recycled wool garments, giving new life to textile waste.

care_instructions: Cold machine wash on wool cycle
Do not tumble dry
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: WOOL CARE: Recycled wool can be slightly coarser than virgin merino. It softens with use but is incredibly robust and resistant to pilling.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Hand-braided natural jute that adds organic texture to any room. Hardwearing and earth-friendly.

care_instructions: Vacuum regularly without beater bar
Spot clean spills immediately by blotting
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: SPROUTING: It is normal for loose fibres (sprouts) to appear. Do not pull them; simply trim flush with the rug surface using sharp scissors.

content_triage.marketing_hook: An oversized cushion for casual floor seating, featuring a durable hemp cover and filled with eco-friendly recycled PET fibre.

care_instructions: Removable cover is cold machine washable
Plump regularly to maintain shape
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: FILLING: The recycled PET fill mimics the loft of standard polyester but keeps plastic bottles out of landfill.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Preserved Australian native flowers that last forever. No water required—just place and enjoy the structural beauty of the bush.

care_instructions: Keep away from direct sunlight to prevent bleaching
Do not place in humid areas (e.g., bathrooms)
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: DUSTING: Use a hairdryer on the lowest, cool setting to gently blow dust off the arrangement every few months.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Ultra-absorbent and naturally antimicrobial. Our bamboo-cotton blend dries quickly and stays fresh longer.

care_instructions: Machine wash warm
Tumble dry low
Avoid fabric softeners
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: ABSORBENCY: Fabric softeners coat the fibres and destroy the bamboo's natural absorbency. Use white vinegar in the rinse cycle instead.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Step onto solid stone that dries instantly. Made from fossilised algae, this mat absorbs water rapidly, preventing mould and damp smells.

care_instructions: Wipe with a damp cloth to clean
Sand gently with fine grit sandpaper if absorbency drops
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: FRAGILITY: Ensure the mat is placed on a completely flat, hard surface. Placing it on plush carpet or an uneven tile can cause it to crack under weight.

content_triage.marketing_hook: The ultimate plastic-free shave. A beautifully weighted brass handle designed to last a lifetime while giving a closer, smoother shave.

care_instructions: Rinse thoroughly after use
Store outside the shower to prevent soap scum buildup
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: TECHNIQUE: Do not apply pressure like a plastic razor. Let the weight of the brass handle do the work to prevent nicks.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Standard stainless steel double-edge blades. Sharp, durable, and fully recyclable.

care_instructions: Store in a dry place
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: DISPOSAL: Store used blades in a 'blade bank' (a small tin or jar). Once full, tape securely and recycle with scrap metal.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Fizzing cleaning tablets that make toilet scrubbing easy. Naturally antibacterial without the harsh bleach fumes.
technical_specs: Baking soda and citric acid base

care_instructions: Keep tin sealed tightly to prevent moisture activation
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: USAGE: Drop one bomb into the bowl, let it fizz for 5 minutes, scrub with your brush, and flush.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Made from the root of the konjac plant, this sponge gently exfoliates and balances pH without the need for plastic microbeads.

care_instructions: Rinse and squeeze out excess water after use
Hang to dry completely between uses
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: LIFESPAN: Replace every 4-6 weeks when the sponge begins to break down naturally. Compost the old sponge.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Clean hair, clear conscience. One bar replaces up to three plastic bottles of liquid shampoo. Infused with wild-harvested Kakadu Plum for high antioxidant protection.

care_instructions: Keep bar dry between uses using a draining soap dish
Lather in hands or directly onto wet hair
Store away from direct shower spray
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: DETOX PERIOD: If moving from commercial sulphate shampoos, your hair may feel 'waxy' for 1-2 weeks as it detoxes. Stick with it—your natural oils will balance out.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Deeply moisturising solid conditioner enriched with Australian macadamia oil to tame frizz and lock in hydration.

care_instructions: Glide directly over wet hair ends
Store on a well-draining dish
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: APPLICATION: Conditioner bars don't foam. Rub the bar directly onto the mid-lengths and ends of your wet hair until you feel 'slip'.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Aluminium-free deodorant in a recyclable tin. Uses shea butter and kaolin clay to neutralize odor all day naturally.

care_instructions: Apply a pea-sized amount with fingers
Keep away from extreme heat
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: SENSITIVITY: If you experience redness, you may have a bicarb sensitivity. Discontinue use and contact support for our bicarb-free option.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Lightweight loose mineral powder with built-in SPF15 protection. Breathable coverage in a refillable container.
technical_specs: Zinc Oxide and Titanium Dioxide base

care_instructions: Apply with a kabuki brush
Keep moisture out of the container
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: REFILLS: Purchase our compostable refill pouches to top up your existing jar.

content_triage.marketing_hook: A zero-waste balm housed in a push-up compostable cardboard tube. Provides a sheer, buildable wash of colour for lips and cheeks.

care_instructions: Push up gently from the base
Store below 30°C to prevent melting
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: PUSH TUBE: If the balm is hard to push up in winter, warm the tube in your hands for a minute first.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Moso bamboo handles with charcoal-infused bristles. Each brush is numbered to prevent mix-ups in family bathrooms.

care_instructions: Store in an upright, dry position
Snap off the bristle head before composting the handle
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: BRISTLES: While the handle is 100% compostable, the nylon bristles must be removed with pliers and placed in general waste.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Say goodbye to unrecyclable plastic tubes. Chewable toothpaste tabs housed in a refillable glass jar. Perfect for travel and zero-waste living.

care_instructions: Keep lid tight to prevent moisture
Chew 1 tablet, wet brush, and brush normally
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: FOAMING: These tablets foam less than traditional toothpaste because they lack SLS, but they clean just as effectively.

content_triage.marketing_hook: 100% vegan floss made from plant-based corn starch, lightly coated in Candelilla wax, inside a refillable glass vial.

care_instructions: Refill with bare spools when empty
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: COMPOSTING: PLA requires industrial composting facilities to break down completely; it will take much longer in home compost bins.

content_triage.marketing_hook: A traditional Ayurvedic tool. Pure copper naturally eliminates bacteria, improving oral hygiene and breath far better than brushing alone.

care_instructions: Scrape gently from back to front
Rinse with warm water after use
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: TARNISH: Copper oxidizes and tarnishes naturally. To shine it, rub with a mixture of salt and lemon juice, then rinse.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Medical-grade silicone cup that completely replaces tampons and pads. Reusable for up to 10 years, saving money and massive landfill waste.

care_instructions: Boil for 5 minutes between cycles to sterilize
Wash with mild, unscented soap during use
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: SIZING: Model 1 is generally for under 30s who haven't given birth vaginally. Model 2 is for over 30s or those who have.

static_data.origin: Designed in Australia, Made in China

content_triage.marketing_hook: Highly absorbent, leak-proof underwear holding up to 3 tampons worth of fluid. Comfortable organic cotton against your skin.

care_instructions: Rinse in cold water until it runs clear
Machine wash cold
Line dry, strictly no tumble dry
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: FABRIC CARE: Never use fabric softeners or bleach, as they break down the high-tech absorbent layers.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Soft bamboo velour pads with secure snap wings. A breathable, chemical-free alternative to disposable plastic pads.

care_instructions: Soak in cold water
Machine wash warm with normal detergent
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: STAINING: Some staining over time is normal for natural fabrics and does not mean they are unhygienic. Sun-drying helps naturally bleach stains.

static_data.origin: Designed in Byron Bay, Made in China

content_triage.marketing_hook: Adjustable waterproof shell with ultra-thirsty bamboo inserts. Designed to fit from newborn to toddler (OSFM).

care_instructions: Dry pail used nappies
Pre-wash warm, main wash hot (60°C)
Line dry shells, inserts can be tumble dried low
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: FIT: Ensure the elastics sit snugly in the groin crease, not on the thigh, to prevent leaks.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Gentle on sensitive skin and the earth. 99% pure water wipes made from bamboo viscose, entirely free from plastic fibers.

care_instructions: Do not flush down toilets
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: DISPOSAL: While compostable, wipes used for heavy soiling should go in the general bin for hygiene reasons.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Drop-proof and durable. Includes a plate, bowl, and cup made from compressed bamboo fibre, skipping the melamine.

care_instructions: Top rack dishwasher safe
Do not microwave
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: DURABILITY: Highly durable against drops on standard floors, but extreme force on hard tiles may cause cracking over time.

content_triage.marketing_hook: A soothing, multi-purpose barrier cream with Zinc and Calendula to rapidly treat nappy rash and dry patches.

care_instructions: Apply a thin layer to clean, dry skin
Store below 30°C
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: CLOTH SAFE: This balm uses natural oils that will easily wash out of cloth nappies, unlike thick petroleum-based creams.

static_data.origin: Designed in Perth, Manufactured in China (Ethical Audit: Grade A)

content_triage.marketing_hook: Transform your home into a sanctuary. The Stone Diffuser uses ultrasonic vibrations to disperse essential oils without heat, preserving their therapeutic properties. Its matte ceramic cover doubles as a piece of sculptural decor.

care_instructions: Wipe reservoir after every 3rd use
Use distilled water for best performance
Do not submerge base in water
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: TROUBLESHOOTING: If mist output is low, it is usually due to oil buildup on the ceramic oscillator disc. TO FIX: 1. Unplug the unit. 2. Dip a cotton bud in rubbing alcohol. 3. Gently wipe the small round disc at the bottom of the water tank. 4. Rinse with cool water.

content_triage.marketing_hook: A compact desktop HEPA-13 air purifier that silently removes 99.9% of pollen, smoke, and dust from your personal workspace.

care_instructions: Vacuum the outer pre-filter monthly
Replace main HEPA filter every 6-8 months
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: NOISE LEVEL: Features a whisper-quiet sleep mode operating at under 24dB.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Stop throwing batteries away. These lithium-ion batteries feature a built-in USB-C port for rapid charging, lasting over 1000 cycles.

care_instructions: Do not use in high-drain devices like camera flashes
Use included 4-in-1 charging cable
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: CHARGING: The LED indicator blinks while charging and remains solid when fully charged. Do not charge via traditional battery chargers.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Stay connected on any adventure. This rugged power bank features a bamboo casing and a high-efficiency solar panel for off-grid charging.

care_instructions: Keep ports clear of dust and sand
Avoid leaving in extremely hot cars (>50°C)
Wipe bamboo casing with a dry cloth only
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: SOLAR EXPECTATIONS: The solar panel is designed for emergency top-ups only. A full charge via sun can take 40+ hours. For daily use, charge via the included USB-C cable.

content_triage.marketing_hook: High-performance, reef-safe sun protection. This clear zinc formula rubs in easily, offering 4 hours of water resistance without the chemical footprint.

care_instructions: Store below 30°C
Apply 20 mins before sun exposure
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: APPLICATION: Warm the balm slightly between fingers before applying to help it glide on completely clear.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Effective protection without the DEET. Uses a highly concentrated Lemon Eucalyptus oil blend proven to deter sandflies and mosquitoes.

care_instructions: Shake well before use
Reapply every 2 hours
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: SENSITIVITY: Safe for children over 6 months, but always patch test on a small area of skin first.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Kills 99.9% of germs without stripping your skin. An alcohol-based gel heavily infused with Aloe Vera for constant hydration.

care_instructions: Keep away from naked flames
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: REFILLS: Purchase our 1L bulk pouches to refill your glass pump bottle and save plastic.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Instantly freshen a room or linens without harsh synthetic aerosols. Pure essential oil blends inspired by the Australian landscape.

care_instructions: Spray 30cm away from fabrics
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: PET SAFETY: Contains concentrated oils. Do not spray directly onto pets or in small, unventilated rooms with birds.

static_data.origin: Wool from NSW, Felted in Nepal (Fair Trade)

content_triage.marketing_hook: Reduce drying time by 30% and soften clothes naturally. These solid Australian wool balls bounce through your laundry, replacing toxic softening sheets.

care_instructions: Leave in dryer between uses
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: SCENTING: Add 3-4 drops of your favorite essential oil directly to the balls before tossing them in for naturally scented laundry.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Built from a single piece of dense hardwood, these pegs contain no metal springs to snap or rust on your clothes.

care_instructions: Can be left on the line permanently
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: GRIP: The wedge design means they slide firmly over clothes and the line, gripping tighter in wind rather than snapping.

content_triage.marketing_hook: A heavy-duty canvas bag suspended on a collapsible bamboo X-frame. Stylish enough for the bedroom, practical enough for heavy loads.

care_instructions: Canvas bag is machine washable cold
Wipe bamboo frame with damp cloth
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: CAPACITY: Holds roughly 60 Litres, equating to two standard wash loads.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Support your local ecosystem. This hand-crafted hotel provides a nesting site for solitary native bees, who are vital for pollinating Australian flora.

care_instructions: Place in a sunny spot, facing North or North-East
Mount at least 1m off the ground
Keep clear of spiderwebs to protect bees
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: MAINTENANCE: Every 2 years, replace the internal bamboo tubes to prevent parasite buildup and ensure a healthy nesting environment for new generations.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Bring the bush to your backyard. A curated box of non-GMO seeds including Billy Buttons, Everlastings, and Kangaroo Paw.

care_instructions: Store in a cool, dark, dry place until planting
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: SMOKE TREATMENT: Some native seeds (like Kangaroo Paw) benefit from smoke treatment before planting. Refer to the included guide for simple at-home methods.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Keep your humidity-loving indoor plants thriving. A solid brass mister that creates a micro-fine spray while looking beautiful on your shelf.

care_instructions: Empty water if storing for long periods
Polish with lemon juice to restore shine
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: PUMP CARE: If the pump becomes stiff, apply a single drop of mineral oil to the plunge shaft.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Stronger than cotton and softer than nylon. Our hemp leashes are naturally antimicrobial and get softer with every walk. Perfect for sensitive skin and heavy pullers.
technical_specs: Completely biodegradable at end of life

care_instructions: Hand wash with mild soap
Line dry only
Hemp is mould-resistant but should be dried if soaked in salt water
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: DURABILITY: Hemp is incredibly strong but is a natural fibre. Inspect regularly for fraying if your pet is a 'leash chewer'.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Safe chewing for tough jaws. Made from sustainably tapped Hevea rubber, avoiding the toxic plastics found in cheap toys.

care_instructions: Dishwasher safe (top rack)
Discard if pieces are torn off
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: SAFETY: No toy is indestructible. Always supervise heavy chewers.

content_triage.marketing_hook: A heavyweight stoneware bowl that won't get tipped over. Designed to perfectly match our human dining range.

care_instructions: Dishwasher safe
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: HYGIENE: Ceramic is superior to plastic for pet bowls as it doesn't develop micro-scratches where bacteria breed, preventing pet acne.

content_triage.marketing_hook: A gentle, soap-free wash designed specifically for a dog's pH. Soothes sensitive, itchy skin without synthetic fragrances.

care_instructions: Keep out of eyes
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: UNSCENTED OPTION: If your dog has extreme allergies or hates baths, we recommend the Unscented variant to prevent overwhelming their nose.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Never leave plastic in the park. Thick, leak-proof bags made from corn starch that break down completely in compost.

care_instructions: Store in a cool, dry place
Use within 12 months of purchase
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: DISPOSAL: Can be placed in home compost bins meant strictly for ornamental gardens, not vegetable patches. Alternatively, place in general council waste.

content_triage.marketing_hook: A sharp, tart contrast to rich dark chocolate. Made with ethically sourced cacao and native Australian Davidson Plum.

care_instructions: Store in a cool, dry place below 22°C
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: ALLERGENS: Manufactured in a facility that also handles tree nuts and dairy.

content_triage.marketing_hook: Skip the plastic microfibres found in standard tea bags. Hand-blended organic herbal teas presented in a beautiful, refillable tin.

care_instructions: Keep sealed to retain freshness
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: BREWING: Brew at 100°C for 3-5 minutes depending on desired strength.

content_triage.marketing_hook: A completely plastic and metal-free way to brew your tea. Hand-pierced ceramic that fits perfectly over a standard mug.

care_instructions: Rinse immediately after use to prevent tannin staining
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: CLEANING: If tea stains build up, soak in warm water with a teaspoon of baking soda for an hour.

content_triage.marketing_hook: The perfect zero-waste gift. Instant delivery via email for the eco-conscious person who is hard to buy for.

care_instructions: Treat code like cash
rag_resources.manual_excerpt: REDEMPTION: Gift card codes can be entered at checkout. If the order total is less than the card value, the remaining balance is saved for future use.
